sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function RenderSignUp () { const Navigate = useNavigate(); async function signup () { // sends username, password, email from input server then creates s3 bucket in username and stores details on mongo const username = document.getElementById('signupusername').value; const password = document.getElementById('signuppass').value; const email = document.getElementById('signupemail').value; const Posts = [] const Photos = [] let signupdata = { Username: username, Password: password, Email: email, LastCommentNum : 0, // set comment count for indexing Posts: Posts, Photos: Photos } let options = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify(signupdata), } let signinurl = 'http://192.168.1.93:4001/signup/' + username let response = await fetch(signinurl, options) let convert = await response.json () if ( response.status === 401 || response.status === 400){ alert("Your username is in use please try another") } else if ( response.status === 200){ localStorage.setItem('jwt_token', convert.token) // Store JWT in storage alert("Welcome to the club! Please setup your profile") Navigate ("/editProfile/"+username) } } return( <> Sign Up
Username
Password
Email
Already a member? Sign in now
); }
